Gallery | U of L women defeat Ball State 69-56

University of Louisville women's basketball player Bria Smith shoots against Ball State at the KFC Yum! Center in Louisville. U of L beat Ball State 69-56. Nov. 23, 2014.  , Jessica Ebelhar/The Courier-Jour
Fullscreen
University of Louisville women's basketball player Mariya Moore, center, grapples for a loose ball with Ball State players Moriah Monaco, left, and Jill Morrison they faced off at the KFC Yum! Center in Louisville. U of L beat Ball State 69-56. Nov. 23, 2014. Moore scored a total of 22 points.  , Jessica Ebelhar/The Courier-Jour
Fullscreen
University of Louisville women's basketball player Bria Smith, right, teammate Jude Schimmel, left, and Ball State player Nathalie Fontaine reach for a loose ball at the KFC Yum! Center in Louisville. U of L beat Ball State 69-56. Nov. 23, 2014.  , Jessica Ebelhar/The Courier-Jour
Fullscreen
University of Louisville women's basketball players huddle after Emmonnie Henderson, center, scored in the second half as they faced off against Ball State at the KFC Yum! Center in Louisville. U of L beat Ball State 69-56. Nov. 23, 2014.  , Jessica Ebelhar/The Courier-Jour
Fullscreen
University of Louisville women's basketball player Emmonnie Henderson shoots and scores against Ball State at the KFC Yum! Center in Louisville. U of L beat Ball State 69-56. Nov. 23, 2014  , Jessica Ebelhar/The Courier-Jour
Fullscreen
University of Louisville women's basketball player Jude Schimmel snags the ball from Ball State player Jill Morrison as they faced off against Ball State at the KFC Yum! Center in Louisville. U of L beat Ball State 69-56. Nov. 23, 2014.  , Jessica Ebelhar/The Courier-Jour
Fullscreen
University of Louisville women's basketball player Megan Deines shoots against Ball State at the KFC Yum! Center in Louisville. U of L beat Ball State 69-56. Nov. 23, 2014.  , Jessica Ebelhar/The Courier-Jour

University of Louisville women's basketball player Sara Hammond, right, drives against Ball State player Nathalie Fontaine at the KFC Yum! Center in Louisville. U of L beat Ball State 69-56. Nov. 23, 2014.  , Jessica Ebelhar/The Courier-Jour

University of Louisville women's basketball player Bria Smith, left, goes against Ball State player Nathalie Fontaine for a loose ball at the KFC Yum! Center in Louisville. U of L beat Ball State 69-56. Nov. 23, 2014.  , Jessica Ebelhar/The Courier-Jour
